description: Try our easy to follow Peach Jelly & Yoghurt Cups recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Jelly,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Low salt,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Raspberry,Sesame free,Quick & easy dessert,Stone fruit,Christmas,Soy free,Wheat free,Low fat,Peanut free
name: Peach Jelly & Yoghurt Cups Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place gelatine leaves in a bowl and cover with cold water. Set aside for 5 minutes to soften.

Meanwhile, stir sugar and 1 cup of iced tea in a saucepan over medium heat until sugar has dissolved. Increase heat to high and boil for 5 minutes or until syrupy. Remove from heat. Squeeze water from the gelatine leaves. Add gelatine to syrup and stir to dissolve. Strain into a jug. Stir in remaining iced tea.
Divide peach slices and raspberries into six 1-cup plastic tumblers. Pour over jelly. Refrigerate for 2 hours to set.
Stir honey and vanilla into yoghurt. Spoon over the set jellies. Top with raspberries.
